articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur confirm that Son Heung-min has joined Major League Soccer (MLS) side Los Angeles FC on a permanent transfer.
articles.title: Son Heung-min: Tottenham forward leaves club to join LAFC

articles.description: The US Open men's and women's singles winners will get $5m (£3.7m) each as part of a total pot of $90m (67.4m) in prize money which the tournament says is "the largest purse in tennis history".
articles.title: US Open: Tournament organisers reveal record prize money for 2025 event

articles.description: Mikel Arteta says new Arsenal signing Viktor Gyokeres will be "100%" ready for the start of the new season after making his first start in 3-2 defeat by Villarreal.
articles.title: Viktor Gyokeres: Sweden striker will '100% be ready' for Premier League start

articles.description: Newcastle started the summer predicting a "big" transfer window but have suffered plenty of frustration - what is going on St James' Park?
articles.title: Newcastle United: Alexander Isak, Benjamin Sesko - what's going on?

articles.description: Chris Woakes says he “wouldn’t have been able to live with himself” had he not tried to bat for England in the extraordinary finish to the fifth Test against India.
articles.title: Chris Woakes: Injured all-rounder 'never considered not batting' for England v India

articles.description: Manchester United make contact with Brighton over Carlos Baleba, Everton open talks with Manchester City for Jack Grealish, and Alexander Isak trains alone amid Liverpool pursuit.
articles.title: Football gossip: Man Utd eye Brighton's Carlos Baleba, Everton in Jack Grealish transfer talks with Man City

articles.description: A late flurry of runs from Southern Brave's tailenders takes them to a thrilling one-wicket win against  Manchester Originals in The Hundred.
articles.title: The Hundred 2025: Tailenders star as Brave beat Originals in thriller

articles.description: Recent news surrounding Manchester United's finances has not been positive - which will have left fans wondering how they are able to finance a move for RB Leipzig striker Benjamin Sesko.
articles.title: Benjamin Sesko: How are Manchester United able to afford £74m striker?

articles.description: As Louis Rees-Zammit becomes the latest 'crossover athlete' unable to make the NFL transition, BBC Sport looks at why it's so hard to break through.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: Why is NFL transition so hard to accomplish?

articles.description: Former Bayern Munich forward Thomas Muller joins Major League Soccer side Vancouver Whitecaps for the rest of the 2025 season.
articles.title: Thomas Muller: German hero joins MLS side Vancouver Whitecaps after Bayern Munich exit
